itemDisplayName: Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) SOFS cluster
description: This template creates 3 Azure VMs on an existing VNET and provisions them as a Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) Scale-Out File Server (SOFS) cluster
summary: This template creates 3 Azure VMs for a Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) cluster on an existing Azure VNET and Active Directory domain
